name: Post kid
description:
Where's Wally but as a video game, eheh. Good luck!

Game made in 48 hours during the game jam color. The theme was school playground and our main color was #f2b200.

  • Visuals made by Eva Benharira
  • Music and sound design by Simon Ferragut
  • Game design and code : Eva, Simon, Alaric Rougnon-Glasson and Eloïse Tassin

We hope you'll have as much fun as we did making it ❤🎨
